Text: Anyone tested this yet besides the poster?

Is this REALLY an exe for 1.31? I don't see any of the new difficulty levels mentioned in the changelog notes to 1.31....Such as "dunce" or "godlike" or "ultimate", and a lot of other features I didn't see in the game. And yes, I was able to download the update and use this file. Says "1.31" in the corner but this could just be a hack job from 1.2

Okay, nevermind, the new difficulty levels are new AI levels, not actual game levels. And I verified a few other things as well. This is the real deal.

Many thanks, this is a GREAT game.
When I used this exe the game just tells me its "too big to fit in memeory" everytime I start it.

Btw, patch 1.4 has arrived.
Anyone planned to crack it?
